articles.title: Meta refuses to sign EU’s AI code of practice
articles.description: Meta will not sign the EU's new rules, calling the implementation "overreach" and claiming it will throttle AI development.

articles.title: NIST Ion Clock Sets New Record for Most Accurate Clock in the World
articles.description: This new result contributes to the international effort to define the second with a much greater level of accuracy than before, enabling new scientific and technological advances.

articles.title: OpenAI claims a breakthrough in LLM reasoning on complex math problems
articles.description: OpenAI says its experimental language model has solved International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO) problems at a gold medal level—a possible breakthrough for AI with general reasoning skills. The results have not yet been independently confirmed. The article OpenAI claims a breakthrough in LLM reasoning on complex math problems appeared first on THE DECODER.

articles.title: Elastic and Tencent Cloud AI search technology make Dunhuang Digital Scripture Cave accessible to everyone
articles.description: Ancient books in the Dunhuang Digital Scripture Cave have now become accessible to everyone online. The Dunhuang Research Institute officially released the Digital Scripture Cave database, including more than 9,900 volumes of Dunhuang documents and more than 60,700 images that contain Buddhist scriptures, legal codes, contracts, silk paintings, and more.With the help of Elastic and Tencent Cloud AI search and large language model (LLM) technology, traditional Chinese and rare characters in...

articles.content: Ancient books in the Dunhuang Digital Scripture Cave have now become accessible to everyone online. The Dunhuang Research Institute officially released the Digital Scripture Cave database, including more than 9,900 volumes of Dunhuang documents and more than 60,700 images that contain Buddhist scriptures, legal codes, contracts, silk paintings, and more.With the help of Elastic and Tencent Cloud AI search and large language model (LLM) technology, traditional Chinese and rare characters in...

articles.title: Enabling customers to deliver production-ready AI agents at scale
articles.description: Today, I’m excited to share how we’re bringing this vision to life with new capabilities that address the fundamental aspects of building and deploying agents at scale. These innovations will help you move beyond experiments to production-ready agent systems that can be trusted with your most critical business processes.

articles.title: Why we might lose our only window into how AI thinks
articles.description: A paper titled “Chain of Thought Monitorability: A New and Fragile Opportunity for AI Safety” proposes a method for improving AI safety by monitoring the internal reasoning of AI models. The research is a collaborative effort from dozens of experts across the UK AI Security Institute, Apollo Research, Google DeepMind, OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, and several […]

articles.title: Pentagon aims to bolster national security with major investments in US AI firms
articles.description: The U.S. Department of Defense today announced new contracts with top artificial intelligence firms in the U.S. in an effort to streamline AI’s move into military applications. Contracts of up to $200 million will be granted to Google LLC, OpenAI, Anthropic PBC and, perhaps more surprisingly, Elon Musk’s xAI, whose Grok chatbot recently made headlines when […] The post Pentagon aims to bolster national security with major investments in US AI firms appeared first on SiliconANGLE.

articles.title: Zuckerberg’s $15B bet: How Meta’s ‘Superintelligence Labs’ became Silicon Valley’s most expensive AI talent war

articles.title: OpenAI Introduces ChatGPT Agent: From Research to Real-World Automation
articles.description: On July 17, 2025, OpenAI launched ChatGPT Agent, transforming ChatGPT from a conversational assistant into a unified AI agent capable of autonomously executing complex, multi‑step tasks—from web browsing to code execution—on a virtual computer environment. articles.title: New research reveals AI has a confidence problem
articles.description: Large language models (LLMs) sometimes lose confidence when answering questions and abandon correct answers, according to a new study by researchers at Google DeepMind and University College London.
articles.content: Large language models (LLMs) sometimes lose confidence when answering questions and abandon correct answers, according to a new study by researchers at Google DeepMind and University College London.

articles.title: AI that thinks like us? Researchers unveil new model to predict human behavior
articles.description: Imagine a self-driving car navigating downtown traffic. To avoid a collision, it must judge whether the pedestrian at the corner is about to cross. Or consider an investment algorithm trading stocks—it needs to anticipate how human investors will react to news before making a move.
articles.content: Imagine a self-driving car navigating downtown traffic. To avoid a collision, it must judge whether the pedestrian at the corner is about to cross. Or consider an investment algorithm trading stocks—it needs to anticipate how human investors will react to news before making a move.

articles.title: Conversations between LLMs could automate the creation of exploits, study shows
articles.description: As computers and software become increasingly sophisticated, hackers need to rapidly adapt to the latest developments and devise new strategies to plan and execute cyberattacks. One common strategy to maliciously infiltrate computer systems is known as software exploitation.
articles.content: As computers and software become increasingly sophisticated, hackers need to rapidly adapt to the latest developments and devise new strategies to plan and execute cyberattacks. One common strategy to maliciously infiltrate computer systems is known as software exploitation.

articles.title: This “smart coach” helps LLMs switch between text and code

articles.content: The CodeSteer system could boost large language models’ accuracy when solving complex problems, such as scheduling shipments in a supply chain.
